110a1('dul ba): lhas char phab nas/ des na shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po 'dir 'khrungs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bram ze khyod kyis/
110a2('dul ba): ji lta bur// zhing dang sa bor mngon sum lhur// de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo// ji ltar bram ze khyod kyi sa bon ni// chung dang shin tu shing cher de mthong ba// bram zengs
110a3('dul ba): kyang sa bon chung ngu dang // phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ljags brkyang bas dbu skra la thug pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yogs nas/
110a4('dul ba): bram ze de la bka' stsal/ bram ze ji snyam du sems/ gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yog par byed pa de/ cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal srid stong gi phyir
110a5('dul ba): yang shes bzhin du brdzur gyi tshig gsung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yi ljags ni sgyu med bden pas bskyed pa dag/ cig
110a6('dul ba): mi bden pa ni gsung bar 'gyur srid dam// bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de bzhin pas// de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes rtogs par bya ba'i rigs// de nas bram ze de mngon par dad nas pa de nas/
110a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis do bsam pa dang / bgal nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba ras/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo
110b1('dul ba): shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag
110b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge ba snyed du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ sku
110b3('dul ba): su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so// de nas bram ze de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/
110b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ras song ngo // sdom la/ krim pri la dang sbrul gdugs dang // mthul dang yul 'khor skyong // glang chen grong dang grong khyer che// srug na dang ri bram ze'i glong //
110b5('dul ba): grong khyer nag po ro tsi// gsing ma can dang de bzhin du// dga' ba 'phel bas tshogs su ni// byas te yang dag brjod pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das krim pi lar byon nas/ bkrim
110b6('dul ba): ma dgas rlong na ba cugs so// de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis/ cho dang ldan pa kril bi la la bka' stsal pa/ thim pa la d+ha pa'i bar gnag pa ni la brtsams te bsgom pa khyod la bshad kyis/ de les
110b7('dul ba): bar rab tu nyor ma yod la zung nig dang bshad do// nas de skad ces bka' stsal ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa krim pi la cang mi smra'o// lan gnyis su yang de bzhin/ lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par byar
111a1('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan pa krim pi la la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa krim bi la khyod la sgor ba gsung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'tshal
111a2('dul ba): to// tshe dang ldan pa go'u tam rab tu 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so// bde bar gshegs
111a3('dul ba): pa de'i dus la bab lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te bsgom pa bshad na/ de'i slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur
111a4('dul ba): lags so// kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// 'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang grong rdal zhes bya ba dang / dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/ dbugs
111a5('dul ba): brngubs so zhes slob ste zhes bya ba nas/ 'gog pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ba slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na/
111a6('dul ba): dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
111a7('dul ba): de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos lus la lus kyi rjes su lha zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyar thos gnas par rang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// kun dga' bo dper na lamatsho
111b1('dul ba): che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas shar phyogs nas banon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems
111b2('dul ba): rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa 'gyur lags so// de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyar thos drang bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes bya ba ras/ nang gi yid la byed pa
111b3('dul ba): yod par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong ba zhes bya ba nas/ sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su
111b4('dul ba): lha zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob po zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa ra/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// dper na kun dga' bo lam po'i
111b5('dul ba): che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas lho phyogs nas gzhod pa can ram/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs nas zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba rnams la tshor
111b6('dul ba): ba'i rjes su lha'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod pa shes so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang /
111b7('dul ba): sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes slob bo// sems rnam par
112a1('dul ba): grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na/ sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung po nas slob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lnga'o// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na
112a2('dul ba): nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas zhes dper bya'o// de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas/ chos
112a3('dul ba): rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa ra/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper ra lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten brtsigs/
112a4('dul ba): par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas banod pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar
112a5('dul ba): 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas/ de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lha zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dag
112a6('dul ba): bo ltar na dra pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te brnams pa yin no// de ras bcom ldan 'das ri bor zhig 'byon no// ri bor der tshe dang ldan pa mon 'gal gyi bu chen po'i nang
112a7('dul ba): bo drang srong rnams kyi mang durab tu byung bar/ tshe dang ldan pa mi bu 'gal kyi bu che pos 'dul bar 'gyung bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo 'u 'gal kyi bu cher po la bka' stsal
112b1('dul ba): pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhang po la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan te/ de'i gdul ba'i dus shes nas
112b2('dul ba): drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su 'jug par brtsams so// de nas drang srong des smras pa/ dge sbyong 'dug cig/ bram ze rnams kyi bsre gnas 'dir ma 'jug cig/ des smras pa nga yang
112b3('dul ba): bram ze yin no// drang srong des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze khyod la gsang byed med// blugs gzar yang ni yod ma yin// khyod ni mgo reg me mchod min// bram ze bdag ces
112b4('dul ba): ci skye smra// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze yi ngo tsha shas// gsang byed blugs gzar shes rab nyid// chu rgyun rtag 'bab dang pa ni// nga yi rig
112b5('dul ba): ba spyi blugs yin// nang du legs par mnyam gzhag pa'i// bden pa kho bo me mchod do// yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis// nyin mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed// gal te de ltar gyur na yang // dge sbyong
112b6('dul ba): mgo reg la ni 'dir skabs mi 'byed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu cher pos rlung dang char drag btang nas/ mtsho bran dang nye ba zhig tu song nas/ shing zhig gi drung du rkyen cing 'dug go
112b7('dul ba): dedenas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i 'khor zhig gnas pa des bsams pa/ 'di ni 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yin te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bla mar bya ba yin
113a1('dul ba): gyis/ mal bdag gis 'di'i mchod pa bya ba la brtsor bar bya'o sam ste/ klu de gnas ras byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lus la lan bdun du dkris te/ srung
113a2('dul ba): nas mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go// drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug bsngal ba la ma bsams na/ drang srong gi chos las nyams par 'gyur bas de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du
113a3('dul ba): sems te/ rab tu byung ba de rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur te/ bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de nas bsti gnas de nas phyir byung ste blta bar brtsams pa ra
113a4('dul ba): des de mthong nas spras pa/ kye rab tubyung ba kho bo cag gi bsti gnas su zhugs shig/ des smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/ drang srong des de'i nga ro las ngo shes
113a5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po lags sam/ drang srong bdag skye bos de ltar shes so// 'phags pa don ci zhig la byon/ khyod nyid kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas 'ongs so// tshur/
113a6('dul ba): spyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhud do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu che pos zhang po khrod nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
113a7('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gel gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi nang po drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ba 'di lam/
113b1('dul ba): nad bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la chos bshad pa'i rigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drang srong de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ deng
113b2('dul ba): mthur pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas/ drang srong des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/ de nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
113b3('dul ba): gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa
113b4('dul ba): dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lha na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin
113b5('dul ba): gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// skra byi sngam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mo la dbang po rab zhi gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// ces bya ba'i bar gong
113b6('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po song ba dang / klu gzhon nu de gnas de na gcig pu mi dga' bar gyur nas/ de nas ri bor der yams kyi nad dag btang ste/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha byad du mngon
113b7('dul ba): par sprul nas bstiganas der song ste gnas so// de nas ri bor na gnas pa'i skya bo'i tshogs de bsti gnas der lpags nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag la lams kyi nang byung na/ bdag cag kyi/
114a1('dul ba): ji ltar bgyi// drang srong gis smras pa/ phyogs 'di nid du shog la 'dug cig dang zhi bar 'gyur ro// da nas bor na gnas pa'i sgyur ba tshogs de/ phyogs de baspyugs ras gnas so/
114a2('dul ba): phyogs der sbrul gyis gdugs byas pas sbrul gdugs sbrul gdugs shes bya bar grags te/ dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsigs so//
114a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthulan 'bab chu rab tu bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gram slob pa rnams kyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsalaM pa/ dge
114a4('dul ba): slong dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs la gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin/ skyabs gzhan ma yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyis bdag nyid gling dang
114a5('dul ba): bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i// gling gzhan ma yin zhing / skyabs gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// mya ngan dang / smre sngags/
114a6('dul ba): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/ gang zhig yod na ci la bcan nas ci la mngon par zhen te/ bdag ni ci yin zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang /
114a7('dul ba): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams kyi rtsa
114b1('dul ba): mam sa ma / sa na bya pa
114b2('dul ba): nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu rtsom la yid la zung zhig dang ma med do// dge sbyong dag gzugs yod pa na/ gzugs la brta nanas/ gzugs la mngon par 'a ma/
114b3('dul ba): gzugs ni bdag yin mo zhes rjes su lwa ba rnams la mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'dor pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag pa skyes pa'i sgra zhing / skyes pa rnams ri phyir ri
114b4('dul ba): 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ dge slong dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod na/ rnam par shes pa la brten nas/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zher te/ rnam par
114b5('dul ba): shes pa ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing / skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing
114b6('dul ba): 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis ltos shig ces bya ba ras/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na brngubs so zhes slob ste/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lha'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
114b7('dul ba): ru'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na/ kun dga' bo lam
115a1('dul ba): po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ lho phyogs nas gzhon pa can nam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs ra zhes bya ba ras/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lha'o/
115a2('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhir du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na/ nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang / sems rab tu dga'
115a3('dul ba): ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing / dbugs brngub bo zhes slob pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing / dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing
115a4('dul ba): dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lba ba/ de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems la sems kyi rjes su lha zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na rang gi yid la byed pa/
115a5('dul ba): yod par shes so// dper ra rub phyogs nas khyogs 'ong ba de nyid bya'o// de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba de dag nub pas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang /
115a6('dul ba): snyoms su gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyam thos chos la chos kyi rjes su l+ya zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i char thos gnas par mang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ 'di la ste/ lam poche
115a7('dul ba): bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rter zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas ri bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rter
115b1('dul ba): 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas/ de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su sgra'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhir du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i char thos gnas pa nang gi ming ma/
115b2('dul ba): byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bor ltar rgya/ dran pa che bar gzhag pa bani la banan nas bsgoms pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das yul sgra ngan nas ljongs rgyu ring gshegs par/
115b3('dul ba): bang mdzod srug po can du byor ras/ bang mdzod stug po can dbang mdzod stug po car gyi tshal na bzhugs so// bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul sgra
115b4('dul ba): ngan nas ljongs rgyu ning gshegs pa na/ bar mdzod stug po can du byor nas/ bang mdzod stug po can na bang mdzod stug po'i tshal ra bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /
115b5('dul ba): khyu nas khyur 'dus shing phrad nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
115b6('dul ba): 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod stug po caran gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du
115b7('dul ba): 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// / 'dul ba gzhi// bam po sum cu bzhi pa/
116a1('dul ba): de'i ma khyim bdag gi bra yul 'khor skyong 'bor nyid du nus pang 'dug pa gyur to// das kyi bdag gi buyul 'khor stong mam dusapas te/ de ltar co rnam
116a2('dul ba): gsungs pa'i dor bdag gis shes bstar na/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho bar du tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu stsal gyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par
116a3('dul ba): byung ba/ spyad pa 'di ni slab ma yin pas/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
116a4('dul ba): kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po car gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bsgyur/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs paspong
116a5('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas bang mdzod stug po car gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs nas
116a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dong //
116a7('dul ba): nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
116b1('dul ba): bgyur pa bdag lags par bsrungs pa'i chos 'dul da la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rtogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa ldad/ bdagra bcom ldan 'das kyi skur sna ngas par snad pa spyod bar bya'o// /
116b2('dul ba): bdagagi bu/ pa dang ma gnyis kyis gnang dus/ btsun pa ma gar ngong // khyim bdag gis/ de ba ga shegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi thos rnamyos ni ba dang ma nas kyis pags /
116b3('dul ba): 'byin pa dang bskyed par rdzogs par mi byed do// btsun pa bdag gis ci nas pa dang mas gnang ba de ltar bgyi lags so// de nas khyim bdug gi bu yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mtsho/
116b4('dul ba): par dga' ste yi rangs nas/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par
116b5('dul ba): rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/ khyod nged kyi bu gcig pa/ sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun pa med pa yin pas/ khyod shi bar gyur na nged mi 'dod bzhin du
116b6('dul ba): 'bral grang / gson bzhin du ga la gtang / yab yum gal he re zhig gnang na legs/ gal te ma gnang na deng slan chad 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal lo// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong
116b7('dul ba): gis nyi ma gcig kyang zan bcad par byas so// gnyis dang gsum nas/ bdud gyi bar du zar bcad pa byas so// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la/
117a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig/ khyod ni shin tu gnon pa bde ba 'dod pa yin pas/ khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi shes te tshungs par spyod pa spyad
117a2('dul ba): dka' 'o// rab tu dben pa bya dka' 'o// gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' ba dka' 'o// gnas mal dgod pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mthar gnas pa ni mnags dka' 'o// bu yul 'khor
117a3('dul ba): skyong tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig/ sbyid pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ de skad smras nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas
117a4('dul ba): khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pa dang mas me du rnams la bcol ba/ kye che du dag re zhig bu yul 'khor skyong slong zhog/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams/ khyim bdag
117a5('dul ba): gau bu yul 'khor skyong gang ra ba der dong sde phyin nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smos so// bu yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyod ni shin tu gnon pas bde
117a6('dul ba): nad pa lags zhes bya ba nas/ bsod nams dag sa shig ces bya ba'i bor gong ma bzhin du'o// de skud smras pa/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong sa mi smra'o// de nas
117a7('dul ba): ga kyi yum par byung gi sa mas g.yul 'khor sgo ba'i brdzangs rnams pa thal pa/ byeb ni rung ga ni ga bu sel 'am chung sla na// dzinas kyi ba gni sasum pa gyur ma
117b1('dul ba): ldangs rnams kyis/ yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sras des pa yul 'khor skyong ma khyen par mdzod cig/ byod na shin tu gzhor bas bdebaba'ang ba lags la zhes bya ba das/
117b2('dul ba): sod nams ngag mdzod cig ces bya ba'i bar sngam bzhi du'o// de skad smras na/ khyi bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi smra'o// de nas gnod dungag gis/ yul 'khor skyong gi pa dang mal 'di skad
117b3('dul ba): ces smras so// yab yum sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig bgyi/ rab tu 'byung du gnong dang / gal te dga' bar gyur na 'di gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/ gal te mngon par mi
117b4('dul ba): dga' bar gyur na yang / bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags pa gzhan su zhig mchis/ gzhon nu bdag cag la gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na/ de bzhin du gnang bar bya'o// de nas yul 'khor
117b5('dul ba): skyo gyi ne'u ldangs dag gis/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ pa dang mas gnang ste/ 'di skad ces gal te bu rab
117b6('dul ba): tubyung nas lta bar byed na'o zhes kyang zer ro// shes ldan dag blta bar bya'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang da ba der song
117b7('dul ba): skye phyor pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'ad so la/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gyi
118a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag na pa dang mas gnang lags kyis/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
118a2('dul ba): slong gi dngos po thob pa ldan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen/
118a3('dul ba): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ bang mdzod stug po can du ji tsam
118a4('dul ba): bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rims kyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
118a5('dul ba): dga' ra bar bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bsnyen par rdzogs te lo bcu lon nas dgra bcom pa thob ste/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
118a6('dul ba): te/ sngon bdag khyim par gyur na/ pha dang ma la rab tu byung nas blta bar bya'o zhes khas blangs pa yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis khas blangs pa de mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong /
118a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang ra ba der song ste phyir pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
118b1('dul ba): tshad ldan pa sal 'khar slong gis 'dis ces gsol to// tsun pa rjon pa dganas kyis pa dUr bar/ pa dang pal bstsu bar rgyab zhes gsar byas blangs pas/ bdug gas kyis rnam da /
118b2('dul ba): mthar 'byor du mche'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sems khyab par mdzad cing / khyab par mdzadu nas/ zugs la mdzang cing gzugs la ma nga rab
118b3('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni slar yang khyim gnas pa'am/ sogs 'jog spyod pas 'dod pa dag la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin no snyam du mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yus
118b4('dul ba): 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong song la sems can ma brgal ba rnams ni sgrol zhig/ ma grol ba rnams ni grol bar gyis shig/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs
118b5('dul ba): phyung zhig/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yi rangs
118b6('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham
118b7('dul ba): thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar
119a1('dul ba): thoganas gsas la lta spyad pamakhas smra / byung babar nga chos pos rnas nas kha da rgyug sa ga nang du spyong du/ mchis pa smo rgyur
119a2('dul ba): bang mdzod stug po can du byin nas/ bang mdzod sdug po can gyi bang mdzod stug po'i tshal du 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro shas thabs bgos lhung /
119a3('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ bang mdzod stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de rim gyi sa bang mdzod srug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der song nas/ de'i
119a4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha bar sgo'i khyams na skyes pa skra mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sgo drung na 'dug pa
119a5('dul ba): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kha zer bar byed de/ dge slong mgo reg 'o ni dag gis kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de/ 'o ni ngag gis kho bo'i bu gcig pa/ sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ bzod pa/ mi mthun
119a6('dul ba): pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi
119a7('dul ba): khyim nas rgya gag ma gtogs pa de sbyid pa yang ma thob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrang pa dang / myur ba myur bar phyir byung ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi bran mo rgar me zhig/ zad drong rul ba
119b1('dul ba): nag mod pa ni gdor ba'i phyir rdzogs te skor byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor slong mas sngo gyi nga monar ma de mthong ngo // thong ngas kyang blad po nang po dal 'dis byas smras so// sring pos
119b2('dul ba): zang dron rul pa zhag lor pa 'dor ma yid na/ kho bos bzas lhung bzed 'dir chu gcig/ 'phags pa gsol cig/ de nas sdor gyi brang po rgan po des zar dron rul ba zhag lod pa lhung bzed du 'jug par
119b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / bzhin dang / snga dang / sma dngags dag gi mtshar ma shin tu legs par bzung ngas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// rje'i sras yul 'khor
119b4('dul ba): skyong lags sam/ sring mo kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so// de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgad po de rings pa rings pa tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
119b5('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi pha la 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ sras yul 'khor skyong bar mdzod stug po can du byon nas/ ring mo zhig lags na nyid kyi khab tu ni byon mi bzhed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
119b6('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gi phas lag pa g.yon pas sgra bsdus nas ras yug cig gi spang g.yogs bgos bzhid du/ tshe dang ldar pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldar pa yul 'khor skyong
119b7('dul ba): bang mdzod drug po can du byon nas/ rtsig drung nig tu 'dug nas par dron rul pa zhag lor bza bar byed pa dang / dem tsha dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras
120a1('dul ba): so labar sbyong rkyod bar rjong grug pos du phyin nas rang ba zhig sa dang / ci'i phyir dang gnyis bu 'jug pa ma da/ tsud chu byag 'angab rkyo pa gyu/
120a2('dul ba): 'thor brtsub/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na/ rgya bag ma gtogs pa skyid pa yang mthob/ bskad kyang ma bskrad pa dang / myur ba myur bar byung ngo // b+ha yul 'khor skyong yid par la sem ma shes song/
120a3('dul ba): gal te kho bos shes na de skad mi smra bzhig/ bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo// khyim padag bzod do// de nas tshe dang ldad pa yul 'khor skyong gi bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la yan la/
120a4('dul ba): thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas/ rang gi khyim du sbyan bshams pa nyi la 'dug tu bcug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas/ yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul
120a5('dul ba): 'khor skyong yul ring zhige lon nas khyim du 'ongs kyis/ kye re zhig khyod bdag nyid kyis sdod du chos la sta gon gyis shig dang / de la bu yul 'khor skong longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul
120a6('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi ma rang nyid kyis snod du bcos nas sta gon byas so// de nas mi zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyi phung po chen po/ gal te mi gcig pha rol na 'greng na/ mi gcig tshu rol
120a7('dul ba): na 'dug pa mi mthong la/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba spungs so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so//
120b1('dul ba): bu yul 'thor myong khyong khyim la/ bud med kyi rnams kyi bung med kyi nong dang / bud med kyi ngagarmongs dang / bud med kyi 'ang bzhes bya ba gang yid pa yang 'di rnyeng cig yod do// gzhanas rgyang bya ba 'ad/
120b2('dul ba): mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang sa le sbam yang brgya brag dum dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag dum yod nag pal gzhan lha spos kyang ci dgos/ bu yul 'khor skyong cur khyod 'dug la
120b3('dul ba): 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag kyang thong zhig/ bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems pa lha na
120b4('dul ba): bdag gis gdams shing rjes su bstan to// bu yul 'khor skyong gdams ngag stsol cig/ bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston cig dang / khyod kyi tshig la bdag dang bas mnyan par bgyi'o snyam du sems
120b5('dul ba): so// khyim bdag gi chung ma tshur/ khyod kyis sha na'i ras skye sar pa byos la/ gser dang sa la'i sbram gyis khong ste/ shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing gting zab pa gang na yod
120b6('dul ba): pa der bor cig/ gni de las khyod kyi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dor pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur tero// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
120b7('dul ba): sum du sems te/ bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ba ma nus so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong goms/ mna' ba la bcol ba/ kye bag sar re zhig ji lta
121a1('dul ba): #bu'i mnyes pa rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskor pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug
121a2('dul ba): pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ bu yul 'khor skyong de sngon khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus
121a3('dul ba): rnams kyis bkru ba dang / dri rnams kyis byug pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bgyis la/ bu yul
121a4('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/ gang gi slad du rje'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo ji lta bu zhig ces kyang smros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul
121a5('dul ba): 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi chung mas/ ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa/
121a6('dul ba): dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor bas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sngor khyim par gyur pa na/ dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis
121a7('dul ba): mnye ba dang / khru ba rnams kyis bkru ba dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskor pa dang / rgyad rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gto
121b1('dul ba): ba byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smras so// rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa lha mo de ji lta bu zhig
121b2('dul ba): lags/ sring mo lo ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sur sbyar mangs par srung ba spyod pa / lha'i bu ma'i cheng du ma son no// de nas tshe dang ldar pa yul 'khor myang gis/ sngon gyi chung bi la sring ma sa tshigatu
121b3('dul ba): spras pas/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na/ ci mi sA la tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag
121b4('dul ba): ste/ ci mtho tsom lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod cig ces/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca'
121b5('dul ba): ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bskabs shing tshim par byas so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'kho
121b6('dul ba): skyong gis zos nas/ lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ de'i tshe
121b7('dul ba): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ltos shig lus ni nor bu dang // rna rgyar gyis ni bkra byas kyang // nad dang slu ba'i chos can de// brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin// skra yi lan bu brgyad lhas shing //
122a1('dul ba): mig ni mig sman gyis bskus pa'ang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// dri rnams kyis ni lus bskus la// rkang pa gtsag gis byugs pa yang /
122a2('dul ba): byis pa rmongs par byed rus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// mig sman gsar gyis bkra byas shing // rus pa'i lus ni brgyan pa yang // byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin do//
122a3('dul ba): ri ridags shor bas rI btsugs nas// ri dgas gzung ba ma nus ltar// rngod pa'o dod 'bod bcug la// zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya// de ras tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pa dang ma la chos/
122a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstar/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song
122a5('dul ba): ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bang mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po ko'u rab bya
122a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi snyad pa yang sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i
122a7('dul ba): phyir skabs phyen/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur sral po// de nas rgyal po ke'u rab byas/ tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kA ye nang rje khyod song la myur du bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal
122b1('dul ba): phyag dar byos shig/ sang ba der skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ skyes pa des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i lhar mnyan nas/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams cad phyag dar /
122b2('dul ba): byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung na nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te rgyal po ke'u rab
122b3('dul ba): bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye
122b4('dul ba): na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya la/
122b5('dul ba): sbran par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas skyes pa de rgyal po ko'u rab bya gang ra ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po ko'u rab byi la 'di skad ces smras so// lha gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing
122b6('dul ba): bzhugs la/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs phye na/ bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur
122b7('dul ba): snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab byas
123a1('dul ba): mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kA ye dang rje tshur/ bzhon pa bzang po byung du sngogs shig/ de la pa nor nas deng kho nas shes ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// lha bka'
123a2('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po ko'u rab bya'i lhar mnyan nas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po ko'u rab bya ba gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po ko'u rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so//
123a3('dul ba): lha bcibs pa bzang po bsdogs lags te/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya ba non pa bzang po la zhon nas/ bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan
123a4('dul ba): pa yul 'khor skyong la lta ba dang bsnyed bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji tsam bzhod pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas/ rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar bzhugs so//
123a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko'u rab bya rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po byod pa legs so tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod
123a6('dul ba): nyid kyi yul lags pas/ bzhed na bdag kyang stan la g.yar drongs shig/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag yul 'khor skyong gis bdag stan la g.yar drang bar 'tshal
123a7('dul ba): lo// rgyal po chen po gdan mchis kyis/ gal te bzhed na bzhugs shig/ de nas rgyal po ko'u rab bya/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar
123b1('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas na rgyal po ko'u rab byas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan yum
123b2('dul ba): 'khor skyong gal te rigs dman pa 'am/ longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa 'am/ gtugs par gyur na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim me
123b3('dul ba): par rab tu 'byung ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni ko'u rab bya yin la/ longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis/ 'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal ba dag la bgo bsha' bya
123b4('dul ba): yis/ shes ljon yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la/ 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag thong zhig/ bsod nams dag gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po che ma lags pa'i mgror du 'bod
123b5('dul ba): pas bdag mgron du 'bod kyi/ 'tsham pas ni ma lags so// khyod lta bus bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i mgron du yang ma 'bod cig/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang
123b6('dul ba): 'tsham pa'i mgror du 'bod pas mgron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po chur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces/ kye yul 'khor skyong kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ sngo ba med
123b7('dul ba): cing 'tshe ba med la/ slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyeng sla ba yin gyis/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong / bang mdzod stug po can 'dir gnod shig dang / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin
124a1('dul ba): gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya'o zhes bgyi ba lags na/ rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo// gzhan/
124a2('dul ba): yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhu lags so// rgyal po chen po gsungs shig/ thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o// kye yul 'khor skyong /
124a3('dul ba): bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te/ de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med
124a4('dul ba): par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nyo dus yongs su nyams pa dang / longs spyod kyis yongs su
124a5('dul ba): nyams pa'o// kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag rgas/ 'khogs
124a6('dul ba): gtugs pas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa bdog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na/ mi bdog na lha smos kyang tso dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang
124a7('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de rgabs yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams ra skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho ngas
124b1('dul ba): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/ 'di ni rgabs yongs su rnams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong rgabs yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yinang/ skra dang kha spu bregs/
124b2('dul ba): te/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nur thor bu lang tshol bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ nachod dar la
124b3('dul ba): bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gang gi tshe/ rtsed po dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / cha ba dang / brgyan pa'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe/ nye du rnams mchims brnangs shing ngu bzhin dang bcas
124b4('dul ba): pas ma rangs bzhin skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa khe nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs
124b5('dul ba): nas skra dang kha spu bregs ras/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yir te mi 'dod do// kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis yongs
124b6('dul ba): su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu na pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni ra ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che bas/ bdag gis re zhig 'dod pa dag
124b7('dul ba): bdog kyang longs spyad par bla ba ma yin/ mi bdog na lha smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
125a1('dul ba): de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nad kyis
125a2('dul ba): yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes lngar yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya
125a3('dul ba): ba nas/ rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med cing kand med pa'i rang bzhin can dang / ran par 'ju ba'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang bsil
125a4('dul ba): bas ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha dro ba ma yin pa dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pos khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'jug
125a5('dul ba): 'gyur na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhig shes/ mthong zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kye yul 'khor skyong nye dus
125a6('dul ba): yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha ta ga nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs chad/ nye du rnams kha tag pas/ ma la bdag
125a7('dul ba): sgrasgo dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nye du'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung /
125b1('dul ba): ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nye dus yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldar yul 'khor skyong ni nye dus yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/
125b2('dul ba): gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi che du ni/ ko'u rab bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pe/ bang mdzod stug
125b3('dul ba): po can 'di nyid rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong bya ba nas/ rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do//
125b4('dul ba): kye yul 'khor skyong longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyod bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
125b5('dul ba): gi longs spyod do bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur gyis/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de longs spyod yongs
125b6('dul ba): nyams pa yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni longs spyod kyi yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'a
125b7('dul ba): skyong ni longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na zhes bya ba nas/ rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stug po car 'dir
126a1('dul ba): rigs mchog dang rigs bzang po yin pas 'di lta ste/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin da/ 'di la shes lngar yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes/ mthong ba thos/ rtogs/
126a2('dul ba): nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag
126a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung
126a4('dul ba): nas/ rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di
126a5('dul ba): thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin/ 'jig
126a6('dul ba): rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes te sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang
126a7('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // bdag gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing / rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i ni don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ shes ldan yul 'khor
126b1('dul ba): skyong gi sa don de nyid ci nas/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te gsungs shing / rnam par ma phye ba 'di'i ni don rgyas par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/
126b2('dul ba): shes lngar yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsung //
126b3('dul ba): de'i phyir rgyal po cher po khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhir lam thob cig/ rgyal po cher po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu 'am/ nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa na/ mchod
126b4('dul ba): kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tshel bab pa/ swA gnag pa/ nyams rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / daltar gyi lus su 'di lha ste/ tshe'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ spa dngags sam/ srid du'am/ skom
126b5('dul ba): su mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/ kyai yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu 'am/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa ra/ ra chod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra gnag pa/ nyams rtsal
126b6('dul ba): bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang / da ltar gyi lus su 'di lha ste/ tshe 'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/ srid du'am/ sboms su 'am/ sma dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/ da ri
126b7('dul ba): bdag na tshod kyis lo brgyad cu lon pas rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs te/ bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang / langs pa yang gzhan gyis bya dgos so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
127a1('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/
127a2('dul ba): bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do//
127a3('dul ba): shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin
127a4('dul ba): no zhes gsungs pa/ bdag la ni bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul skyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rtar+ya
127a5('dul ba): dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang / bro gar len pa rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon chen po che chen po dang
127a6('dul ba): ldan pa gang dag/ bdag gi gshed pa phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par bgyid pa mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med
127a7('dul ba): pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci la dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob
127b1('dul ba): cig nargyal po chen po da ltar khyod la lus kyi gnod pa 'ga' mchis sam/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag la mchis te/ da war rlung gis rgyab tu gnod do// rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par/
127b2('dul ba): gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / sgyu mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul skyong mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / tsar+ya dang /
127b3('dul ba): shing rta ba dang / ba shan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro gar len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon chen po che chen po dang ldan
127b4('dul ba): pa gang dag yin pa tshurabadag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor
127b5('dul ba): skyong ma lags so// gang gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan
127b6('dul ba): dang / 'dul sbyong mkhan dang / glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rta rgya dang / shing rta pa dang / bshan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang / 'drol bu dang / go re long bgyid pa dang / bro gar len pa dang /
127b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon tshan po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzad pa/ yid du mi
128a1('dul ba): 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams choms shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ mi bzod pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams/
128a2('dul ba): myong ngo // rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med de skyabs
128a3('dul ba): med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
128a4('dul ba): ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang yang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig can
128a5('dul ba): 'di ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba nas/
128a6('dul ba): rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang dag bdag mchi na rjes bzhin 'breng la/ 'greng na 'greng ba dang / nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/ 'od kyang shes
128a7('dul ba): ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsung
128b1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa
128b2('dul ba): skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mo 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang /
128b3('dul ba): bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig ces bgyis na 'grub bam
128b4('dul ba): kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so// kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ 'jig
128b5('dul ba): rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu'i
128b6('dul ba): bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'chi ba'i phyi bzhin shog cig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig
128b7('dul ba): rten pha rol tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ 'di las dgongs nas
129a1('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong na thos/ rtogs nas sgra dang kha spu bregs/
129a2('dul ba): nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/
129a3('dul ba): bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/
129a4('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing / btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor
129a5('dul ba): skyong 'di skad ces/ 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs
129a6('dul ba): rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa la yongs su spyod cing / btsun
129a7('dul ba): mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las shar phyogs nas mi yid bcugs pa/ yid ches pa brtan po/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs ngas
129b1('dul ba): de la 'di skad ces/ lha bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir 'chi ba na/ de na bdag gi ljongs 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang bdag cig mthong ste
129b2('dul ba): lnga ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dram drangs te gzhom pa dang / choms nas rdal du dgod par rung ngo zhes sman/ rgyal po cher po ji snyam du
129b3('dul ba): sems/ khyod yul der dram drang zhing / drangs nas bcom sde rnal du 'god dam/ khyod ljongs de dag 'dod dam/ kye yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis ljongs de dag/ 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di ma
129b4('dul ba): bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhod pas/ dra ma drang drang ba dang dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang / bcom nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na/ ljongs de dag tu dra ma drangs zhing / dra ma drangs nas bcom la/
129b5('dul ba): bcom nas rnal du 'god do// bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo// // 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po sum cu lnga pa// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs
129b6('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des/ de las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa
129b7('dul ba): yin no zhes gsungs pa de/ bdag gis shes/ mthong / thos/ rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/
130a1('dul ba): de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la/ bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gyis de skad ces
130a2('dul ba): smras nas/ gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi// de dag chags dang bcas pas sogs byed cing // nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la/
130a3('dul ba): phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong // mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa// thag bcug bcom sde cham du phab nas ni// rgya mtsho tshun chad kyis kyang mi chog ste// chags pas pha rol don du
130a4('dul ba): gnyer bar 'bad// mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag/ yongs su gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas// chog mi shes pas rang gi lus bor te// sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur// srog ni ther zug
130a5('dul ba): ma yin tshe thung ste// dga' bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min// 'chi ba na ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur// nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin// spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang // snying du sdug pa'i//
130a6('dul ba): tshogs 'di 'dus nas ni// kye ma kye hud 'di ni brlag gyur ces// skra bshig mchi ma caran gyi gdong gi du// de ni ras kyis dkris te phyung nas ni// me spar nas ni de nas sreg par byed// rang gi las kyi sems
130a7('dul ba): can de khrid nas// de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas phrogs// 'dir skye ba na yang gcig pu skye// 'chi ba na yang gcig pu 'chi 'gyur zhing // gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur// skye
130b1('dul ba): 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin ro// phyug po'am yang na bkren pa'am bcar po'am// bus pa de bzhi gnyis kas reg myong nas/ brtan po de yis rnams kyang yogs mi 'gyur/ bus babus pa yin
130b2('dul ba): phyir rtag tu g.yo// blo chung mi mkhas rjes su slob byed cing // de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing // mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// khor dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal
130b3('dul ba): las mi 'grol// shes rab der rnams kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig/ srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma gtogs pas// blun po sdig pa'i las
130b4('dul ba): rnams byed pa yin// phrad tshegs thabs sam yang na chos min pa'am// mthu yis gzhan dag las ni gang 'phrog pa// nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas// nying nor brgyud pas grol
130b5('dul ba): bar 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs bzung nas ni// sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom// de bzhin skye dgu nyes byed 'di dang ni// 'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis
130b6('dul ba): bcom// shing las shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni// gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang lhung // 'dod pa sna tshogs sdug cing yid 'ong ba// rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms//
130b7('dul ba): 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur// 'dod pa yod na khon dang 'jigs pa skye// de ltas rgyal po 'di ras rab byung ste// dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin// de nas rgyal po
131a1('dul ba): ko'u rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yi rangs nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te sngad las langs nas song ngo //
131a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byod pa dang / bram ze zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
131a3('dul ba): brgya cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od gzer nyi stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba de/ rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
131a4('dul ba): mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/ tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can mig tu sdug pa dang // dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun
131a5('dul ba): dang ldang// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lnga// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byod pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom
131a6('dul ba): ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod spur nub par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo
131a7('dul ba): sbyar ba byas nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi// zhes bya ba nas/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo de bzhin
131b1('dul ba): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzub pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram zes de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad
131b2('dul ba): bas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ 'od kyang lha dang mi rnams su
131b3('dul ba): cing mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la/ rang sangs rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
131b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa
131b5('dul ba): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lha 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na/
131b6('dul ba): yang ngal tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog lnga byin pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zug zhig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wA rA NA si'i grong khyer du/
131b7('dul ba): rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de lhag par snyar dang gsal dga'
132a1('dul ba): bar gyur to// wA ra t+na si na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan nig yod pa de la/ bram ze mos smras pa/ bram ze byung ba'i dus la bab gyis/ rgyal po do'i spyan sngar song la
132a2('dul ba): rjes su mthun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byas dang / gal te na grang ba'i skyabs cung zad thob par 'gyur ro// de song ba las/ ji tsam ra rgyal po glang po che la zher nas byung ngo // bram ze des
132a3('dul ba): bsams pa/ ci bdag gis rgyal po la bskyod dam/ 'on te glang po che dam pa la snyam pa la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ glang po che dam pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug cing yid
132a4('dul ba): du 'ong ba yin la/ rgyal po la ni khyad par du yin pas/ re zhig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod par bya'o snyam ras/ des tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ sa srungs bu yi lus kyi sha tshugs lhar/
132a5('dul ba): mtshar mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mdog dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa// glang chen dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags// de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas/
132a6('dul ba): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba// mi rnams mig 'phrog dga' bskyed pa gang // de la khyod kyis bskyod pa'i tshig smras kyis// khyod la grong gi mchog de lta sbyin no// da
132a7('dul ba): slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin ro// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ri bram ze 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngal 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod/
132b1('dul ba): bas ngas 'di la grong mchog la phyir do// dkar yang ngal 'dis tshigs su bca pa gcig gis brjod pas ngas yang 'dirang byang chub tu mang bsad to// grong khyer cher po byas/
132b2('dul ba): nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas pa ni'i gdas zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// yul srug nar gshegs pa dang / yul srug nar bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs dang / lang tshong pa
132b3('dul ba): thos pas rgyags par gyur nas/ bdag dang 'dra bar ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin ro zhes sgrogs shing rnam par sgrogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig ra dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la
132b4('dul ba): gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te chos 'chad do// bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul srug ner byon no zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang
132b5('dul ba): kha mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa zhes thos kyis/ ci bdag las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam 'on te ma yin/ lhar 'gro'o snyam nas de byung ba dang / ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i
132b6('dul ba): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brlan pa/ 'od gzer nyi ma spong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lngar kun nas
132b7('dul ba): bzang po mthong ngo mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/ tshad ni lhag par ring ba ni ma yin no snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug
133a1('dul ba): tor blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam nam mthong nas/ de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram
133a2('dul ba): dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze nyon mongs kyis thong zhig/ gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te balhas kyang / 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni mthong
133a3('dul ba): bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor mi mthong ngo zhes ma thos sam/ 'on kyang gal te de bzhin
133a4('dul ba): gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na/ khyod kyis khyim na me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na/ tsan dar sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyis/ de phyung la gzhol cig dang / de bzhin
133a5('dul ba): gshegs pa yab dang yum las 'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad ni de yin no// bram ze dbang pos bsams pa/ de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste/ bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na song ste blta'o snyam nas/
133a6('dul ba): de rings pa rings par song nas me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i thub kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las/ de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to// de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsams pa/ dge sbyong go'u
133a7('dul ba): ma ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis/ song la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig
133b1('dul ba): mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang
133b2('dul ba): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas nas bya ba ras/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lba ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas
133b3('dul ba): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang
133b4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so//
133b5('dul ba): de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
133b6('dul ba): gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis tsan danas mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod pashams lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze gnang gis song la
133b7('dul ba): shoms shig/ de nas des sa phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu/ rim gro chen pos mchod sdong de bsgreng nas dus mchod chen po bshams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang rten dge bar gyu
134a1('dul ba): cig ces bya bar rig nas/ rtsa ku shas btags te bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod pashams pas na/ dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grags so//
134a2('dul ba): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas/ mu stegs can rnams ni spa bkod / lha dang mi rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni yi rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe//
134a3('dul ba): mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing / kha cig ni bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ bram ze'i
134a4('dul ba): grong du gshegs so// mu stegs can rnams kyis/ dge sbyong ge'u ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rings pa rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du deng ste lhags nas smras pa/
134a5('dul ba): chos thob par gyur cig/ chos thob par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag de ci zhig/ kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni mthong gis/ ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i
134a6('dul ba): bar du 'gro bar bya'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dge bdag cag gi rgud pa gang lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ha ma 'khor stong nyid brgya lnga bcu dang spu gri'i ser ba
134a7('dul ba): 'bebs shing 'ong ste/ bu dang bcas pa dum bu med par byed par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe kho nas bzhugs shing grogs bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni/
134b1('dul ba): bzang po ma lags te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsad na ni 'khod par bya'o// bzhugs shing gsang par/
134b2('dul ba): bgyi'o zhes/ de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs/ khu tshur bcangs/ go bgos te byung ba dang / lam gyi dbus na shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang du 'dong / de
134b3('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ dgra gsad pa'i phyir ro// khyed cag gi dgra su yin/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o// shes ldan dag gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na/ byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin shes ldan
134b4('dul ba): dge slar lo gcig/ de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang / des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o snyam nas/ des
134b5('dul ba): ri brags su zhugs nas me btang ba dang / ri brags kun tshig nas/ ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag dang dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni thag ring
134b6('dul ba): po kho na yin gyis/ ri brags 'dir ni phung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis/ ma bsad kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang / gsad par ma nus pa dang /
134b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag 'di ci byed/ bcom ldan 'das ri brags rnams zhugs kyis tshig ra/ dgum par rngo ma thogs lags so// ngas gsad
135a1('dul ba): dam/ bcom ldan 'das dgum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho dar / 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams lha'i
135a2('dul ba): mthus me de zhi bar gyur to// de rnams mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
135a3('dul ba): kyis de rnams kyi bsam dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/
135a4('dul ba): thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
135a5('dul ba): du'o// / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya rgang po 'dis nye du la chags pas/ bsod nams
135a6('dul ba): ma lags pa mang du bsags te/ ri brags bsregs pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang
135a7('dul ba): gnyen la chags pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te/ ri brags bsregs pa de legs par rab tu nyod la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngor byung ba ri brags shig na spre'u lnga
135b1('dul ba): rgya'i tshags banas pas/ lo thog skyes shing skyes pa rnams cad gapan to// ribrags na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs 'dus nas par chur du thos bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldang dag sde'u rnabs kyis matsag/
135b2('dul ba): la gnod par byed na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhar dag gis smras pa/ spre'u rnams gsar mod/ de rnamasa'i lhar gsad par bya/ ri grags kyi rtse 'khor gyi shing thams cad bcad de/ shing dzin du
135b3('dul ba): ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la/ nye 'khor rnams tsher mas bskor gtang / de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur tang der de rnams gsad par bya'o// de nas de rnams kyis
135b4('dul ba): ri brags kyi che 'khor gyi shing thams cad bcad/ shing tim tu ka gcig pu bzhaganas che 'khor rnams tsher ma'i ra bas bskor te/ srungs ma pa'i mi bzhag nas bsgo ba/ khyed kyis gang gi tshe spre'u rnams
135b5('dul ba): tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sngor cig/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang / spre'u rnams kyis sde dpor la smras pa/ sde dpon shing
135b6('dul ba): tu ka smin cing mchis kyis gsol du gshegs so// de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang / shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te/ shing tin tu ka la bza' bar brtsams so// de nas srungs ma'i mis/
135b7('dul ba): ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa shes ldan dag shing tin tu ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyis/ khyed cag gi bya ba 'am/ byed pa gang yin pa de gyis shig
136a1('dul ba): de ras ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhu dang dgra sta thogs/ khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas/ shing tin tu ka gcad par brtsams pa dang / de nas
136a2('dul ba): spre'u de rnams bred de mchod rgal shing kha phan tshur rgyu bar byed do// sde dpon ni sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang / spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sde dpon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam/
136a3('dul ba): nga ba thob cing mchis te phar tshun du rgyu lags na/ khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngus bzhugs ka des tshigs su bcad de smras pa bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la/ bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra// shing
136a4('dul ba): gi 'phro ni mang yod pas// sems las bskyangs te bza' bar gyis// de nas yang sde dpon gyi phrug gu zhig ri brags de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas/ sems khongs su chud
136a5('dul ba): cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / de sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po ci'i phyir lag pa 'grab ba la gtad nas sems khongs su chu da
136a6('dul ba): des smras pa/ da ltar ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong na/ ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol gdod pa ma byas/ bcings
136a7('dul ba): na ji ltar pha rol gnod par bya/ kho bos khyod dgrol lo zhes/ des de bkrol ba dang / de nas des ri brags der me btang ste/ ro bregs kun tshig pas ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas
136b1('dul ba): sngangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag dang spre'u rnams ri thag ring po khor yid gyi/ phung ba chen po gzhan 'di byung sde ri brags bsregs kyis/ me gsad kyis slar ldog go zhes/ de rnams me gsang
136b2('dul ba): pa'i phyir brgyugs pa dang / spre'u rnams kyang shing tin tu ka las babs nas bros so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ spre'u'i phrug gu gang yin pa de ri/ shAkya rgan po 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang
136b3('dul ba): 'dis che dul chags pas ri bregs bsregs la/ da ltar yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brags bsregs so// nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas/ nag po'i grong khyer du sangs
136b4('dul ba): rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// ro hi ta kar byon ras/ ro hi ta kar na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe gnod spyir glang chen stobs gnod sbyir
136b5('dul ba): rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdum sar song ba dang / gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bskyed par byon nas ro hi ta ka na/ bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so// zos
136b6('dul ba): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang kabacom ldan
136b7('dul ba): 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang cher stobs la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par smon par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdza/
137a1('dul ba): cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas gnod sbyin grang stobs stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na
137a2('dul ba): ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud ras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
137a3('dul ba): 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brla sprul te/ stan nang tshangs can dang /
137a4('dul ba): sngas nang tshangs can dang / gor bu lnga brgya dang / zhugs ling lnga brgya bshams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sdang //
